page.title: 08Pets of pupils at Sneyd Sch.
page.content: Out of 29 pupils in a first year form at Sneyd Comprehensive School only 3 did not have any pets.Apart from goldfish,the most popular was the cat, one family had 16! 10 families had at least 1 cat.Dogs are also popular. 15 families had dogs,9 had 1 dog,6 had 2 dogs.Other pets included guinea pigs, birds,rabbits,hamsters,terrapins and tortoises.Dogs are lovable and faithful if they are treated properly. I have got 2 King Charles Cavaliers. I take my dogs daily for a run in the park,their favourite game is chasing after a stick.A balanced diet is important as is daily grooming.Long haired dogs like mine should be powdered as well as brushed.Puppies should receive a course of injections which costs about 24 pounds to prevent them from catching any disease.
